summary: LETTER FROM JAMES D. THOMPSON , VICE PRESIDENT OF BETTER BUILT TRAILERS INC OPPOSING THOSE PROVISIONS OF THE EARLY WARNING REPORTING (EWR)REGULATION THAT REQUIRES MANUFACTURERS  THAT PRODUCE OVER 500 SMALL-TO-MEDIUM TRAILERS (THOSE WITH A GROSS WEIGHT RATING (GVWR) OF UNDER 26000 POUNDS) TO SUBMIT COMPREHENSIVE EARLY WORNING REPORTS TO NHTSA. MR. THOMPSON INDICATED THAT SUCH REGULATION WOULD PUT HIM AND MANY OF HIS COLLEAGUES IN TRAILER INDUSTRY OUT OF BUSINESS. *AK
